short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Plugin del sistema facturador de Club de Compras Bi para XGB, S.A.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This Chrome Extension allows XGB, S.A., a company established in Guatemala, to parse the source code of an HTML page in order to capture its data and submit it to their system developed by Facturar.com, as a solution to the previous practice of copy and paste.
